name: UBTDecorator_TagCooldown
doc:
Cooldown decorator node.
A decorator node that bases its condition on whether a cooldown timer based on a gameplay tag has expired.

CooldownTag: Gameplay tag that will be used for the cooldown.
CooldownDuration: Value we will add or set to the Cooldown tag when this node is deactivated.
bAddToExistingDuration: True if we are adding to any existing duration, false if we are setting the duration (potentially invalidating an existing end time).
bActivatesCooldown: Whether or not we are adding/setting to the cooldown tag's value when the decorator deactivates.
